statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns
SELECT id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns WHERE energy_consumed > 100
SELECT id, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns WHERE TIMESTAMP >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT energy_consumed, location FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-02-01'
SELECT * FROM solar_panel_inventory WHERE panel_type = 'Monocrystalline' ORDER BY watts_generated_per_hour DESC
SELECT panel_id, watts_generated_per_hour FROM solar_panel_inventory WHERE watts_generated_per_hour < 500
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_patterns GROUP BY location;
SELECT panel_type, AVG(watts_generated_per_hour) AS average_watts_generated FROM solar_panel_inventory WHERE location = 'California' GROUP BY panel_type;
SELECT id, location, energy_consumed, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, panel_type, watts_generated_per_hour FROM solar_panel_inventory WHERE watts_generated_per_hour > 200 ORDER BY panel_type ASC;
SELECT id, date, time, consumption FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT location, capacity, installation_date FROM solar_panels;
SELECT production_id, panel_id, date, time, production FROM energy_production;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption > 100;
SELECT location, installation_date, capacity FROM solar_panels WHERE capacity >= 5000;
SELECT date, time, consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT production_id, panel_id, production FROM energy_production WHERE production > 500 ORDER BY production DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT panel_id, location FROM solar_panels WHERE location = 'Roof' ORDER BY panel_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ec JOIN energy_production ep ON ec.date = ep.date AND ec.time = ep.time WHERE ec.consumption > ep.production ORDER BY ec.date ASC, ec.time ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT panel_id, capacity, installation_date FROM solar_panels ORDER BY capacity DESC, installation_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, capacity FROM power_plants WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT users.username, energy_consumption.reading_date, energy_consumption.energy_usage FROM users JOIN energy_consumption ON users.user_id = energy_consumption.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY reading_date ASC;

SELECT u.username, e.energy_usage, p.plant_name FROM users u JOIN energy_consumption e ON u.user_id = e.user_id JOIN power_plants p ON p.plant_id = e.user_id WHERE e.reading_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT u.username, p.capacity FROM users u JOIN power_plants p ON u.user_id = p.plant_id WHERE p.capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY Date ASC, Time DESC;
SELECT DeviceID, Consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE DeviceID = 1;
SELECT UserName, Email FROM User WHERE UserID = 1001;
SELECT PanelType FROM SolarPanel WHERE Efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT Date, Usage FROM EnergyUsage ORDER BY Date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY Date DESC, Time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DeviceID, SUM(Consumption) AS TotalConsumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY DeviceID HAVING TotalConsumption > 100;
SELECT PanelType, Production FROM SolarPanel JOIN EnergyProduction ON SolarPanel.PanelID = EnergyProduction.PanelID WHERE Date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY Production DESC;
SELECT UserName, Email FROM User WHERE UserName LIKE '%test%' OR Email LIKE '%example%';
SELECT UserID, SUM(Usage) AS TotalUsage FROM EnergyUsage GROUP BY UserID ORDER BY TotalUsage DESC;
